locations.name: Jorge's Bedroom
locations.description: Simple bedroom in a traditional Colombian finca. Wooden bed frame with white sheets and colorful hand-woven blanket (cobija). White-washed walls with religious images (Virgin Mary). Wooden wardrobe, chair with clothes, small mirror. Tile floor. Small window with view of mountains. Rustic but clean and dignified.

lighting_conditions.pre_dawn: dark, first hint of dawn through window

variations: wide shot showing bed and altar

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, simple rural Colombian bedroom, wooden bed frame, white sheets, colorful woven blanket, white-washed walls, religious images on wall (Virgin Mary), wooden wardrobe, small altar with candle and statue, tile floor, rustic farmhouse bedroom, traditional finca interior, Quindio Colombia
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, modern bedroom, luxury, urban apartment, carpet, large room

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain traditional rural Colombian farmhouse feel

locations.name: Jorge's Farmhouse Kitchen
locations.description: Traditional Colombian farmhouse kitchen. Wood-burning stove (fogón de leña), simple wooden counter and table. Pots and pans hanging on walls. Small modern refrigerator. Shelves with dishes. Window overlooking coffee plantation and mountains in distance. Warm, functional, traditional.

lighting_conditions.early_morning: dim, glow from stove coals, dawn light through window
lighting_conditions.evening: single bulb light, warm glow from stove

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, traditional Colombian farmhouse kitchen, wood-burning stove (fogón de leña), wooden counter and table, pots and pans hanging on walls, small refrigerator, dishes on shelves, window showing coffee plantation and mountains, firewood stacked, cloth coffee filter, rural finca kitchen, Quindio Colombia, warm atmosphere

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain traditional Colombian rural kitchen with wood stove as focal point

locations.name: Farmhouse Porch (Corredor)
locations.description: Covered porch (corredor) of traditional Colombian finca. Wooden beams supporting tile roof overhang. Rocking chairs, hammock in corner. Potted flowers (geraniums, begonias). View of coffee plantation terraces, banana trees, and Andes mountains in misty distance. Classic Quindío coffee country scene.

lighting_conditions.early_morning: soft dawn light, mist in valley, golden hour beginning
lighting_conditions.evening: golden sunset light on mountains, long shadows

variations: wide shot showing porch and view
view focusing on plantation and mountains
